title: Annual Military Ball
description: Annual formal event for NJROTC cadets and their guests.

title: Community Service Project
description: Cadets will participate in a park clean-up and beautification project.

title: Leadership Academy
description: A week-long leadership training program for selected cadets.

title: Veterans Day Parade
description: Cadets will march in the annual Veterans Day Parade to honor our veterans.

title: Drill Competition
description: Annual regional drill competition featuring armed and unarmed drill teams.
